favorites.content: Make it your habit not to be critical about small things.
favorites.author: Edward Everett Hale

favorites.content: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
favorites.author: Buddha

favorites.content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
favorites.author: Oscar Wilde
Abraham Lincoln
favorites.content: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.

myQuotes.content: There are always a million reasons not to do something.
myQuotes.author: Jan Levinson

myQuotes.content: Don't ever, for any reason, do anything for anyone, for any reason, ever, no matter what. No matter where. Or who, or who you are with, or where you are going or... or where you've been... ever. For any reason, whatsoever.
myQuotes.author: Michael Scott

myQuotes.content: You need to play to win. But you also need to win to play
myQuotes.author: Michael Scott

myQuotes.content: I wish there was a way to know you’re in the good old days, before you’ve actually left them.
myQuotes.author: Andy Bernard

myQuotes.content: You Only Live Once? False. You Live Every Day. You Only Die Once.
myQuotes.author: Dwight Schrute
